Package edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.directory

Class FacultyDirectory

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.directory.FacultyDirectory
  • public class FacultyDirectory
extends java.lang.Object
    This class creates a Faculty Directory, which helps maintain a list of faculty members
    Author:
    Sydney Morisoli

    • Field Summary

      static java.lang.String HASH_ALGORITHM
      Constant to represent hashing algorithm

      FacultyDirectory()

      • newFacultyDirectory

        public void newFacultyDirectory()
        Supports functionality for new faculty directory, updates LinkedList to a new LinkedList

      • loadFacultyFromFile

        public void loadFacultyFromFile​(java.lang.String file)
        Loads list of faculty records from a file
        Parameters:
        file - the filename to read files from
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if there is an issue loading the file and a FileNotFoundException is caught

      • addFaculty

        public boolean addFaculty​(java.lang.String firstName,
                          java.lang.String lastName,
                          java.lang.String id,
                          java.lang.String email,
                          java.lang.String password,
                          java.lang.String repeatPW,
                          int maxCourses)
        Adds a Faculty member to the list of faculty
        Parameters:
        firstName - the first name of the faculty
        lastName - the last name of the faculty
        id - the ID of the faculty
        email - the email of the faculty
        password - the password of the faculty
        repeatPW - the repeated password to test for accuracy
        maxCourses - the number of max courses of the faculty
        Returns:
        true if faculty could be added, false if not

      • removeFaculty

        public boolean removeFaculty​(java.lang.String id)
        Removes a faculty from the faculty directory
        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the faculty member to be removed
        Returns:
        true if possible, false if not found

      • getFacultyDirectory

        public java.lang.String[][] getFacultyDirectory()
        Returns a 2D array, each row is a faculty and columns are first, last, and id
        Returns:
        the 2D Array to help with GUI functionality

      • saveFacultyDirectory

        public void saveFacultyDirectory​(java.lang.String file)
        Saves the current faculty directory to the given file
        Parameters:
        file - the name of the file to be saved to
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if an IOException is caught

      • getFacultyById

        public Faculty getFacultyById​(java.lang.String id)
        Given an ID, finds and returns the Faculty member associated with that ID
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the faculty member to be found
        Returns:
        the faculty member with that ID value, null if can't be found
